001package net.tvburger.jdl.knn;
002
003import net.tvburger.jdl.common.numbers.JavaNumberTypeSupport;
004import net.tvburger.jdl.common.utils.Floats;
005import net.tvburger.jdl.common.utils.Pair;
006import net.tvburger.jdl.common.utils.SimpleHolder;
007import net.tvburger.jdl.model.DataSet;
008import net.tvburger.jdl.model.EstimationFunction;
009import net.tvburger.jdl.model.distances.DistanceMetric;
010
011import java.util.Comparator;
012import java.util.Set;
013import java.util.TreeSet;
014
015public class NearestNeighbors implements EstimationFunction<Float> {
016
017    private final DistanceMetric distanceMetric;
018    private final NeighborWeighting neighborWeighting;
019    private DataSet<Float> memory;
020    private int k;
021
022    public NearestNeighbors(int k, DistanceMetric distanceMetric, NeighborWeighting neighborWeighting) {
023        this.distanceMetric = distanceMetric;
024        this.neighborWeighting = neighborWeighting;
025        this.k = k;
026    }
027
028    public DataSet<Float> getMemory() {
029        return memory;
030    }
031
032    public void setMemory(DataSet<Float> memory) {
033        this.memory = memory;
034    }
035
036    public int getK() {
037        return k;
038    }
039
040    public void setK(int k) {
041        if (k <= 0) {
042            throw new IllegalArgumentException("k must be positive!");
043        }
044        this.k = k;
045    }
046
047    @Override
048    public Float[] estimate(Float[] inputs) {
049        if (k < 0) {
050            throw new IllegalStateException("Invalid k set (" + k + ")! Must be positive!");
051        }
052        if (memory == null || memory.isEmpty()) {
053            throw new IllegalStateException("Model has not been trained!");
054        }
055        if (k > memory.size()) {
056            throw new IllegalArgumentException("We have not enough samples!");
057        }
058        float maxDistance = Float.POSITIVE_INFINITY;
059        Set<Pair<DataSet.Sample<Float>, Float>> neighbors = new TreeSet<>(furthestFirst());
060        for (DataSet.Sample<Float> sample : memory) {
061            float sampleDistance = distanceMetric.distance(sample.features(), inputs);
062            if (neighbors.size() < k) {
063                neighbors.add(Pair.of(sample, sampleDistance));
064                if (sampleDistance < maxDistance) {
065                    maxDistance = sampleDistance;
066                }
067            } else if (sampleDistance < maxDistance) {
068                neighbors.remove(neighbors.iterator().next());
069                neighbors.add(Pair.of(sample, sampleDistance));
070                maxDistance = sampleDistance;
071            }
072        }
073        SimpleHolder<Float> totalWeights = new SimpleHolder<>(0.0f);
074        Float[] estimation = getCurrentNumberType().createArray(neighbors.iterator().next().left().targetOutputs().length);
075        neighbors.forEach(p -> {
076            float distance = p.right();
077            float weight = neighborWeighting.weight(distance);
078            Float[] neighborOutputs = p.left().targetOutputs();
079            totalWeights.adjust(f -> f + weight);
080            for (int i = 0; i < estimation.length; i++) {
081                estimation[i] += weight * neighborOutputs[i];
082            }
083        });
084        for (int i = 0; i < estimation.length; i++) {
085            estimation[i] = estimation[i] / totalWeights.get();
086        }
087        return estimation;
088    }
089
090    @Override
091    public int arity() {
092        if (memory == null || memory.isEmpty()) {
093            throw new IllegalStateException("Not trained!");
094        }
095        return memory.getFeatureCount();
096    }
097
098    @Override
099    public int coArity() {
100        if (memory == null || memory.isEmpty()) {
101            throw new IllegalStateException("Not trained!");
102        }
103        return memory.getTargetCount();
104    }
105
106    private Comparator<? super Pair<DataSet.Sample<Float>, Float>> furthestFirst() {
107        return (p1, p2) ->
108                Floats.equals(p1.right(), p2.right())
109                        ? 0
110                        : Floats.greaterThan(p1.right(), p2.right())
111                        ? -1
112                        : 1;
113    }
114
115    @Override
116    public JavaNumberTypeSupport<Float> getCurrentNumberType() {
117        return JavaNumberTypeSupport.FLOAT;
118    }
119}
